Senior ERP Training and Testing Support

WPP is a multinational media and advertising group, one of the world's largest advertising companies, operating in 112 countries, with over 3,000 offices worldwide. WPP has embarked on a global transformation programme to standardise finance processes, to deploy finance shared service and implement a common ERP to replace multiple outdated systems. This involves working with the various agencies under the WPP Group. These initiatives are in full flight in Asia and the Middle East and are now being deployed in LATAM starting with Mexico.

We are seeking a fluent Spanish and English-speaking Training and Testing Consultant who has strong ERP implementation experience, including hands-on ERP functional, testing or IT support experience, and who has good finance process expertise (i.e., PTP, OTC, RTR). The candidates will deliver the training to business users of the system and will support business users during the testing phase for the LATAM country deployments starting with Mexico. The candidate will collaborate with the LATAM Process, Change Management and Training Lead located in Mexico. Deployments are managed remotely with globally dispersed teams of technical and functional experts and travel is not required – certain events may be face-to-face if necessary. You will be part of the Maconomy Core Implementation Team and housed in our Finance SSC office in Mexico however you can work remotely if your home internet speed is strong and reliable.

Very good spoken and written Spanish and English is essential for this role as it involves a lot of communication with business users, conducting of training sessions to business users (i.e., executive-level to operational system users) and studying/translation existing English training materials into Spanish.

Key Responsibilities


Collaborate with the LATAM Process, Change Management and Training Lead on the new ERP deployments including administrative tasks related training business users (e.g., preparation of demo system for trainings, managing test users, updating training materials etc.) and conducting system demonstrations to help train new business users on the new ERP system or to test how the system behaves for certain business scenarios.


Proactively develop your expertise and knowledge on our project-centric ERP system (Deltek Maconomy) to be able to conduct demonstrations, to support hands-on system exercises, and to manage queries from new users.


Study English training materials to educate yourself on the system and to work with the team to translate materials. For example, English materials already exists for front-office topic such as master data, project set up, estimates/quotes, purchase orders, client billing, revenue recognition and reports. And for back-off topics such as vendor invoicing processing and payments, cash allocation, journals, and month-end tasks. For the later, the SSC Spain team can support you with training to the SSC Mexico team.


Manage, coach and delegate work to Junior Training & Testing Support Analyst who will assist you with conducting training and administration activities and who will help business users during user testing.


Build a relationship with business users in agency finance teams, client account teams and SSC teams to manage training to these user groups and to manage issues and/ or change interventions with them.


Help businesspeople to understand the system set up and end-to-end design in a user-friendly business language rather than IT technical jargon.

8+ years of hands-on ERP software experience and a desire to focus on training business users and testing

Strong expertise in finance processes (i.e. P2P, O2C, R2R, Tax)
Experience working in a complex and matrixed organisation

Experience in the areas of system testing and user training

Highly computer literate with proficiency in MS Office and business communication tools such a MS Teams.
